ComicInfo.Summary:
BUCKET LIST Part 3
Wade continues checking off his BUCKET LIST! Deadpool continues to wrap up his remaining business, you know, just in case. This time...Madcap is back to ruin his life! Then - is Deadpool really going to kill Apocalypse? That's his next target...sort of...
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------|----------------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Mike Hawthorne & Nathan Fairbairn | 1 | | Var | Secret Comic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan, Scott Koblish, Guru-eFX & Joe Sabino | Missing | | Var | Hulk Variant Cover | Daniel Warren Johnson & Mike Spicer | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Bucket List, Part 3: Beat It
ComicInfo.Letterer: Joe Sabino,VC's Joe Sabino,VC's Joe Sabino
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Daniel Warren Johnson,Gerry Duggan,Guru-eFX,Joe Sabino,Michael Spicer,Mike Hawthorne,Nathan Fairbairn,Scott Koblish
